item.title: Bitcoin Price Technical Analysis for 08/15/2016 - Support Turned Resistance - NEWSBTC
item.description:
Bitcoin Price Technical Analysis for 08/15/2016 - Support Turned Resistance - NEWSBTC

Bitcoin price could continue to drop after completing a correction to the area of interest at $580. Bitcoin Price Key Highlights Bitcoin price could continue to drop after completing a correction to the area of interest at $580. Technical Indicators Signals Bitcoin price is still trending lower on its short-term charts, following a break below consolidation and reversal formations.

item.title: If I know a Bitcoin address, what's the simplest way to recover bitcoins from it?
item.description:
If I know a Bitcoin address, what's the simplest way to recover bitcoins from it?

My parents separated when I was three and officially split up when I was five. After divorcing my mom, my Dad remarried several times. My relationship with my father's women was odd. There was this ever present, jealous tension that I never knew quite what to do with. I wasn't "another woman".

item.title: Can you "undo" an nlockTime transaction by spending a single UTXO of it before lockTime's block happens?
item.description:
Can you "undo" an nlockTime transaction by spending a single UTXO of it before lockTime's block happens?

Bitcoin Stack Exchange is a question and answer site for Bitcoin crypto-currency enthusiasts. Join them; it only takes a minute: Sign up Here's how it works: Anybody can ask a question Anybody can answer The best answers are voted up and rise to the top Let's say I have a wallet X with money from 3 unspent outputs (UTXOs) A, B and C.

item.title: Bitfinex Announces 5% Bounty for Information Leading to Recovery of Stolen BTCs - NEWSBTC
item.description:
Bitfinex Announces 5% Bounty for Information Leading to Recovery of Stolen BTCs - NEWSBTC

Bitfinex has announced that any person offering information about the hackers, leading to recovery of stolen bitcoin will receive 5% of the recovered digital currency as bounty. In the beginning of this month, the Bitcoin industry witnessed one of the biggest hacking incidents of this year.

item.title: How was transaction a4bfa8ab6435ae5f25dae9d89e4eb67dfa94283ca751f393c1ddc5a837bbc31b mined?
item.description:
How was transaction a4bfa8ab6435ae5f25dae9d89e4eb67dfa94283ca751f393c1ddc5a837bbc31b mined?

"Relayed" and "mined" are completely separate processes and should not be conflated. The transaction is valid, so it was perfectly fine to mine it (i.e. include it in a valid block). "Standard" is a more restrictive requirement, and as you say, this transaction is not standard.

item.title: Experts think bitcoin's tech is the future of finance
item.description:
Experts think bitcoin's tech is the future of finance

Weforum's report says large central banks have already begun looking at how the blockchain can transform the way they move money, especially between countries. It will allow them to do more secure and faster transactions that also cost less than they do today.

item.title: Bitcoin Price Slumps While Altcoins Party - Bitcoin News
item.description:
Bitcoin Price Slumps While Altcoins Party - Bitcoin News

The Bitcoin price has slumped again, dropping to just above $570 in what could be part of another extended bear run. Also read: The Wealthiest Serving Congressman Just Bought His First Bitcoin It's a far cry from just a two months ago, which saw cheers of "to the moon!"

item.title: A friend of mine put bitcoin mining software on a CubeSat that's currently in low earth orbit. He's technically the first human to mine space for profit. * /r/Bitcoin
item.description:
A friend of mine put bitcoin mining software on a CubeSat that's currently in low earth orbit. He's technically the first human to mine space for profit. * /r/Bitcoin

He said they had extra resources on a CubeSat and thought it would be amusing. I don't think anyone is getting rich on this however. Just thought...

item.title: Bitcoin Price Decline Targets $500 Bitfinex
item.description:
Bitcoin Price Decline Targets $500 Bitfinex

Bitcoin price continues decline as the crowd keeps selling. Bitfinex management, so eager to create an impression of recovery, are once again having their liquidity drained by a relentless sell-off, and this time they can't cry "hack!" This analysis is provided by xbt.social with a 3-hour delay. Read the full analysis here.

item.title: Linux.Lady Trojan Turns Redis Servers to Mining Rigs - NEWSBTC
item.description:
Linux.Lady Trojan Turns Redis Servers to Mining Rigs - NEWSBTC

The new Trojan, Linux.Lady turns infected Linux servers running Redis NOSQL database into mining devices, reports a Russian cybersecurity firm. Read more... Linux machine users beware! There is a new Trojan in town that can turn your devices into cryptocurrency mining rigs without your knowledge.
